title: mOhana muraLIdharA
sahitya:
mOhana muraLIdharA pItAmbara tuLasI hArA murahara jagan


caraNam 1    dIna sharaNyA mukundA dayAkara nityAnandA mana
 
 caraNam 2    nanda yashOnAtha kumArA sura munijana hrdaya vihArA jagan
 
 caraNam 3    tAmarai malaridazh kaNNA rAmadAsan paNiyum maNi vaNNA mana
